mapper.select: select d.`day` day, SUM(du.register_usage) registerUsage,SUM(du.unregister_usage) unregisterUsage,SUM(du.total_usage) totalUsage from ncs_day d,ncs_day_usage du,ncs_region r WHERE d.id=du.day_id AND du.region_id=r.id AND r.id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND d.year=#{year,jdbcType=CHAR} AND d.month=#{month,jdbcType=CHAR} GROUP BY d.`day`
